name: Solar System Conflict
description: Solar System Conflict is a multiplayer space-survival game in which a colony of humans is stranded in a recently discovered solar system, in search of a way back to Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bit or higher Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit or higher Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
